title: Nami is showing 2 default skins under skin selection.
body: Perhaps it's because I only have River Spirit Nami and not Koi Nami, but it displays two default skins which are both selectable when choosing Nami.

replies.body:
Have the same problem...
For like EVER...

So it's just irritating for me...
Why would this ever happen?
It's been happening for me since she came out, even after I got river spirit, didn't really think to report it until now though.

I posted a thread about this last week. They didn't respond or seem to care.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/tH62wbMZ-gameplay-nami-classic-skin-dup-in-selection-screen

me too! this happened to me as well
I only owned River Spirit Nami and it shows 2 classic nami in the skin page
I'm pretty sure this bug has been around for awhile and it's not just Nami, try going through the skins then back to the default skin it should fix it.

> I'm pretty sure this bug has been around for awhile and it's not just Nami, try going through the skins then back to the default skin it should fix it.

That worked for when I had the bug for Cho'Gath a while back but not for Nami still.
Yeah, that's been going around on various champs.. they still need to fix it

Thought it was just me...:p 
I don't own any nami skins.  Perhaps this is a sign of a new nami skin? XD
Yup, have had this bug for quite some time now

I've been getting this too, and I don't own any nami skins. 

It's not a big deal at all, unless it's indicative of some deeper bug, but it's still probably worth looking into.
I had the same problem with talon.

The one EUW guy to post here...
Not being very helpful...
